data.comment: The first-half is under way at Estadio do Maritimo - Benfica kick-off to start the match.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Rafa Silva for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In Funchal Maritimo attack through Ruben Macedo. The finish is off target, however.
Manuel Mota awards Benfica a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica push forward at Estadio do Maritimo and Haris Seferovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Maritimo defence.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Maritimo.
Benfica are coming forward and Everton gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 11, Manuel Mota awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Rodrigo Pinho is on target to give Maritimo a 1-0 advantage.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In the minute 17, Play has been interrupted briefly in Funchal to check on Rodrigo Pinho, who is grimacing with pain.
Manuel Mota waits before resuming play because Nicolas Otamendi for Benfica is still down.
Nicolas Otamendi is back on his feet again.
In the minute 21, Manuel Mota signals a Benfica throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Charles Silva is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 24, Maritimo's Charles Silva looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Rodrigo Pinho returns to the field for Maritimo after picking up a slight injury.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Rafa Silva (Benfica) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Maritimo.
In the minute 29, Free kick Maritimo.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Goal! Pizzi levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 32, Great play from Alex Grimaldo to set up the goal.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 36, Maritimo have a goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a Maritimo throw-in in Benfica's half.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Maritimo.
Attention is being given to Maritimo’s Ruben Macedo and play has been suspended briefly.
Ruben Macedo has recovered and rejoins the match in Funchal.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Maritimo.
Pizzi of Benfica smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 41, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Maritimo surge into the attack at Estadio do Maritimo but Rodrigo Pinho’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 43, Manuel Mota signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Maritimo's area.
Free kick Benfica.
Benfica drive upfield and Rafa Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
In the minute 44, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Gabriel Appelt (Benfica) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 45, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Manuel Mota awards Maritimo a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Benfica needs to be cautious. Maritimo have an attacking throw-in.
Maritimo attack but Lucas Africo's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In Funchal, Maritimo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
Benfica are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Maritimo have kicked-off the second half at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Benfica.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ruben Macedo.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Benfica.
Everton scores to make it 1-2 at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 51, Pizzi with an assist there.
Maritimo's Ruben Macedo is back in action after a slight knock.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 54, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maritimo advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Mota blows for offside.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Funchal.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 61, Manuel Mota signals a Benfica throw-in in Maritimo's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 63, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Benfica.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Free kick Benfica.
In the minute 65, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Benfica's Everton has been booked in Funchal.
In the minute 68, Maritimo have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
Jorge Correa is replacing Ruben Macedo for the home team.
In the minute 71, Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a second substitution, with Milson replacing Joel.
Manuel Mota signals a Maritimo throw-in in Benfica's half.
The away team have replaced Luca Waldschmidt with Goncalo Ramos. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Jesus.
In the minute 73, Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 75, Manuel Mota awards Benfica a goal kick.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Maritimo's Milson gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maritimo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Jesus is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maritimo with Andreas Samaris replacing Haris Seferovic.
Benfica make their third substitution with Diogo Goncalves replacing Gilberto.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Maritimo.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In Funchal, Andreas Samaris of Benfica is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Ali Alipour is replacing Lucas Africo for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Jean Cleber is on a sub for Jean Irmer for Maritimo.
In the minute 85, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Benfica.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Maritimo.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Manuel Mota signals a Benfica throw-in in Maritimo's half.
In the minute 88, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick Benfica.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
At Estadio do Maritimo the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Benfica.
Claudio Winck (Maritimo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team have replaced Pedro Pelagio with Rafik Guitane. This is the fifth substitution made today by Lito Vidigal.
The away team replace Pizzi with Jardel.
